title: [GAMEPLAY] Swain Bird Form Emotes Missing
body: Normally swain has two sets of emotes(one for human form, one for bird form), but recently only the human form set works, even while in bird form, making it not quite as satisfying to end-game BM taunt people. Can we get a fix soon? Thanks!

replies.body:
Good catch! 

This is a known issue and is in the process of being fixed!
